# Ziskej API PHP client

## Requirements
- php-http/client-implementation

## Installation & Usage
### Composer

```
{
  "repositories": [
    {
      "type": "git",
      "url": "https://github.com/moravianlibrary/ziskej-api-php-client"
    }
  ],
}
```

```
composer require php-http/guzzle6-adapter moravianlibrary/ziskej-api-php-client
```
